name: out of power (Molten_Hamaxe)
description:
you have to go fullscreen for this to work.

In this game the player have to be near the towers for them to be able to fire, this is shown by a beam of purple light joining the tower and the player

Controls:

wasd or arrows to move the character

click the item you want to buy, and then click one of the available spots to place it

yeah i know its very bad, but at least I tried
